phrases: Long ago, the four nations lived together in harmony.
Then, everything changed when the Fire Nation attacked.
Only the Avatar, master of all four elements, could stop them.
But when the world needed him most, he vanished.
A hundred years passed, and my brother and I discovered the new Avatar...
And although his airbending skills are great.
He has a lot to learn before he is ready to save anyone.
But I believe Aang can save the world.
Look, I am sorry, but Katara and Sokka are not coming to the Fire Nation with us.
If they got hurt, I would never forgive myself.
So get your big butt off the ground and let us go!
I think his big butt is trying to tell you something.
The world cannot afford to lose you to the Fire Nation.
But I have to talk to Avatar Roku to find out what my vision means.
I need to get to the Fire Temple before the sun sets on the Solstice.
We are not letting you go into the Fire Nation, Aang.
At least not without your friends.
It is a long journey to the Crescent Island.
You will have to fly fast to have any chance of making it before sundown.
We have got a long way to go!
Have you completely forgotten that the Fire Lord banished you?!?!?
My father will understand why I am returning home.
You give him too much credit.
My brother is not the understanding type.
Really, Prince Zuko, could not you shoot them down with something more fragrant?
We have to get out of Zuko's range before he shoots another hot stinker at us!
Cannot you make Appa go any faster?
Yeah, but there is just one little problem.
Technically you are still in Earth Kingdom waters.
Turn back now and they cannot arrest you.
If we fly north we can go around the Fire Nation ships and avoid the blockade.
This is exactly why I did not want you to come.
And that is exactly why we are here.
Please Prince Zuko, if the Fire Nation captures you, there is nothing I can do.
The Avatar... and the banished Prince.
This must be my lucky day.
Commander Zhao, what are your orders?
But there is a Fire Navy ship out there, Sir, one of our own.
Prince Zuko, the engines are damaged!
We need to stop and make repairs!
We got into the Fire Nation...
Where do you think the Avatar is headed, Sir?
But I bet a certain banished prince will know.
We are on a collision course!
The boarding party is ready to apprehend Prince Zuko, Sir.
The island Roku's dragon took me to!
Refreshed and ready to fight some firebenders.
Well, I was talking to Momo.
I do not see any guards.
The Fire Nation must have abandoned the temple when Avatar Roku died.
Guardians of the temple of the Avatar.
If the Avatar contacts Roku, there is no telling how powerful the boy will become.
Do you know where you are going?
I do not want to fight you.
I know why you are here, Avatar.
You wish to speak to Avatar Roku.
I can take you to him.
What is he up to, Uncle?
Why did not Commander Zhao arrest me?
Because he wants to follow you.
He knows you will lead him to the prize you are both after... the Avatar.
If Zhao wants to follow our trail of smoke, then that is exactly what I will let him do.
Avatar Roku once called this temple his home.
He formed these secret passages out of the magma.
Many generations of Fire Sages guarded this temple long before me.
We all have a strong spiritual connection to this place.
Is that how you knew I was coming?
A few weeks ago, an amazing thing occurred.
The statue of Avatar Roku, its eyes... began to glow!
That is when we were at the Air Temple.
Avatar Roku's eyes were glowing there too!
At that moment, we knew you had returned to the world.
If this is the Avatar's temple, why did the Sages attack me?
In the past, the Sages were loyal only to the Avatar.
When Roku died, the Sages eagerly awaited for the next Avatar to return.
You are only a hundred years late.
They lost hope the Avatar would ever return.
When Fire Lord Sozen began the war,...
I never wanted to serve the Fire Lord.
When I learned you were coming,...
We will follow these stairs to the sanctuary.
Once you are inside, wait for the light to hit Avatar Roku's statue.
Only then will you be able to speak with him.
The sanctuary doors, they are closed.
Cannot you just open them with firebending?
Like you opened that other door?
Only a fully realized Avatar is powerful enough to open this door alone.
Otherwise the Sages must open the doors together with five simultaneous fire blasts.
I think I can help you out.
Zhao will follow the smoke trail while I use it as a cover.
This is a little trick I picked up from my father.
I seal the lamp oil inside an animal skin casing,...
You have really outdone yourself this time, Sokka.
The Sages will hear the explosions, so as soon as they go off, you rush in.
There is nothing else we can do.
I am sorry I put you through all this for nothing.
That blast looked as strong as any firebending I have seen.
His plan did not even work.
Come on Aang, let her dream.
Sokka's plan did not work... but it looks like it did.
Did the definition of genius change in the last hundred years?
The Avatar has entered the sanctuary.
But look at the scorch marks and down there!
Open the doors immediately before he contacts Avatar Roku.
He must have crawled through the pipes!
The light hits the statue and I talk to Roku.
So why is not anything happening?
It must have been the light.
Avatar Roku does not want us inside.
I do not know what I am doing!
Please, Avatar Roku, talk to me!
It is good to see you, Aang.
Why did you help the Avatar?
Because it was once the Sages' duty.
What a moving and heartfelt performance.
I am certain the Fire Lord will understand when you explain why you betrayed him.
And Prince Zuko, it was a noble effort.
But your little smoke screen did not work.
Two traitors, in one day, the Fire Lord will be pleased.
The Avatar's inside and the doors are sealed.
Sooner or later, he has to come out.
I have something very important to tell you, Aang.
That is why, when you were in the spirit world, I sent my dragon to find you.
One hundred years ago, Fire Lord Sozen used that comet to begin the war.
He and his firebending army harnessed its incredible power...
So the comet made them stronger?
Stronger than you could even imagine.
But that happened a hundred years ago.
What does the comet have to do with the war now?
Sozen's comet will return by the end of the summer.
And Fire Lord Ozai will use its power to finish the war once and for all.
If he succeeds, even the Avatar will not be able to restore balance to the world.
Aang, you must defeat the Fire Lord before the comet arrives.
But I have not even started learning waterbending, not to mention earth and fire.
Mastering the elements takes years of discipline and practice.
But if the world is to survive, you must do it by summer's end.
When those doors open, unleash all your fire power.
How is Aang going to make it out of this?
How are we going to make it out of this?
What if I cannot master all the elements in time?
I know you can do it Aang, for you have done it before.
We must go our separate ways... for now.
But I will not be able to come back to the temple.
How will I talk to you?
I am a part of you.
When you need to talk to me again, you will find a way.
A great danger awaits you at the temple.
I can help you face the threat.
But only if you are ready.
Avatar Roku's going to destroy the temple!
We have to get out of here!
Apparently the only thing I do have is five traitors.
But Commander, only Shyu helped the Avatar.
Save your stories for the Fire Lord.
As far as I am concerned, you are all guilty!
Take them to the prison hold!
